backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing feature requests, user profiles, announcements, study tasks, assignments, and access control with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles across pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout wrapper, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentChatbo: Complex multi-language assignment chatbot with voice, OCR, file upload, message history, and downloadable outputs.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header navigation, mobile drawer, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StudentSathiAssi: Implements an interactive assistant with messaging, voice input, OCR via Tesseract, and assignment-generation workflow.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Sub: Renders a colored subject badge using mapped color classes.
Provides a searchable dropdown for selecting subjects with counts and filtering support.
frontend/src/components/UserGuidelineDoc: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, with automatic refetching on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for feature requests, assignment generation logic, conversation saving, and study planner mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSort.t: Manages and persists the user's chosen study planner sort mode using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSubjec: Provides a hook to store and retrieve subject filters for daily and weekly study planner views using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerView.t: Provides a hook to persist and restore the study planner view mode (daily or weekly) using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and theme variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Implements an assignment formatting tool with multilingual UI, text editing, formatting options, and AI-assisted improvements.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and a grid of navigation cards linking to various tools.
Generates a leave application letter based on user inputs and supports copying the generated text.
frontend/src/pages/NotesCleanerPage.tsx: Cleans and formats rough notes into readable text and allows copying the processed output.
frontend/src/pages/RequestFeaturePage.ts: A form page where users submit feature requests with optional email, using a mutation hook and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: A resume builder UI that collects personal info, skills, and projects, then generates and copies a text-based resume.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx: A full study planner interface supporting authenticated and guest tasks, task creation, sorting, filtering, and exporting.
Utilities to parse duration strings into minutes and format minutes back into readable duration text.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerGuestStor: LocalStorage-based CRUD utilities for managing guest study tasks with ID tracking and legacy cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerPdfExport: Generates printable HTML for study tasks and opens it in a new window for PDF-style printing.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerSort.ts: Deterministic sorting helpers for study tasks, supporting default and date/time ordering.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTaskDateT: Provides utilities to convert date/time inputs to backend-friendly formats and format stored task dates and times for display.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTxtExport: Generates a clean TXT export of study tasks with headers, summaries, per-task details, and triggers file download.
frontend/src/utils/subjectColorMapping.t: Defines subject-to-color mappings and returns badge and indicator color classes based on subject or persisted color.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, scope, and requirements for enhancing subject filter persistence and search with task counts.
unknown.txt: Outlines fixed assignment format features, editor behavior, helper tools, and UI rules for the Student Sathi Assistant module.
